channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Industrial Automation -- 4G Router DX-3021
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Industrial Automation -- 4G Router DX-3021

item.title: CVE-2022-4616|2024-08-03T01:48:38.980Z -- delta%20industrial%20automation -- 4g%20router%20dx-3021
item.description: The webserver in Delta DX-3021 versions prior to 1.24 is vulnerable to command injection through the network diagnosis page. This vulnerability could allow a remote unauthenticated user to add files, delete files, and change file permissions.
